sectionText: Topic:  "The Communications Industry: Places, Practices and the Pillsbury Doughboy".   This course will cover a variety of topics designed to help students learn more about the communication industry with an emphasis on the organizations, people and practices that make things happen in advertising, public relations, journalism and media.   Registration restricted to students in the Weston Exploration Program. Please note, the course will be opened to Campus after the first day of class.  Please contact the Weston Explorer Program department for approval.
